target.query:
from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "carbs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "notes")

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _value: r._value/18.0,
    _measurement: ""
    }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg" 
    or r["_field"] == "iob"
    or r["_field"] == "bolus" 
//    or r["_field"] == "insulin_req"
    or r["_field"] == "bg" 
    or r["_field"] == "isf" 
    or r["_field"] == "target_bg"
    or r["_field"] == "activity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _field: if r._field == "bolus" then "bolus smb" else r._field,
    _value: if r._field == "bg" or r._field == "target_bg" then r._value/18.0 else if r._field == "activity" then r._value*500.0 else r._value,
    _measurement: ""
    }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "bolus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bolus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["smb"] == "false")
  |> drop(columns: ["smb", "type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "" }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "tbs" and r["_field"] == "percent")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "basal": (r._value + 100)*(-1)}))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bg")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, label: if r._value < 70 then "low" else if r._value < 180 then "normal" else "high" }))
  |> group(columns: ["label"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cob" or r["_field"] == "cr")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "" }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "carbs" or r["_field"] == "notes")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ time: time(v:r._time), carbs: r.carbs, notes: r.notes }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dev" or r["_field"] == "cob")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "", is_cob : if r.cob > 0 then 1 else 0, _value: r.dev }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_cob <= 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, dev: r.dev }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dev" or r["_field"] == "cob")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "", is_cob : if r.cob > 0 then 1 else 0, _value: r.dev }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_cob > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, dev_cob: r.dev }))

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "iob")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openaps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "insulin_req")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "ns")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "treatments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tbs")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _measurement: ""
    }))
